reviews.text: Tastes exactly like it should. I subbed the VG version of C&C with the SC at 2% with success.

I have hs ice cream, which according to your reddit post works fine. I don't have Australian chocolate... 350+ flavors and still missing some. I'm sure this question gets old, but are there any subs for it?
Great job Vurve! Keep up the good work. Also I love listening to you guys on the diy or die podcasts. Thank you for giving so much back to the community!
This is a great recipe the perfect use of real flavors cookies and cream and takes on a multi almost mocha like Flavor after about 4 weeks
